reviews.review_msg: His class is very manageable. He teaches well and makes sure everything is clear, does some activities to help remember the concepts better...first day, he gave away chocolate! Oh & the videos he showed us in class are funny but still educational!
Pretty good prof! Records the lecture and posts them online just in case you missed anything. Very clear and organized. Includes videos and tons of other information.

This guy is awesome! Makes lectures (more) interesting with lots of video clips, sometimes funny but always relevant. Which helps to remember stuff. His exams are fair. Read the text!Definitely recommend his class.
